body.name: Peak Gear Compact Sling Crossbody Backpack and Day Bag. Lifetime Lost & Found ID
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 5 hrs 21 mins
features: Fabric type 300D Linen Type Cationic Fabric (PU)
Origin Made in the USA or Imported

WELL DESIGNED - Compact bag ideal for travel and everyday use. Stylishly designed to complement both men's and women's fashion. A perfect small crossbody daypack for your convenience. These bags are perfect companions for strolls, hikes, or cycling. They are also adept at carrying your camera or other essential accessories. Their versatile design allows for comfortable wear across the chest, and effortless switching between left and right shoulders.

HIGHEST QUALITY - Experience the Peak Gear difference. Grey Canvas Snow Fiber material is durable and lightweight. Water resistant. One strap design is very comfortable. This pack will hold up for years of use, whether your are biking/cycling or just walking.

LIFETIME RECOVERY SERVICE INCLUDED - Quickly and safely recover misplaced bags. If your sling bag is ever lost and found, ReturnMe, the world’s largest item recovery company, will connect you to the finder and help get it back to you from anywhere in the world. Each tag has a unique code that is linked to your secure online portal, keeping your personal information private. Finders have clear contact instructions on the tag and receive a bonus gift as a reward. Service is free for life.
ORGANIZE BETTER - A mini bag that holds a mighty punch! Large main section. Zippered and magnetic closures for security. Single pocket on front of strap is versatile to carry small items like keys.

LIFETIME GUARANTEE – Experience the Peak Gear Difference. Buy from a US-based company that prides itself on providing top quality products and exceptional customer service. Just read the reviews of our other products. Get our newest over the arm/sholder slingbag ÷ purse, with peace of mind knowing your bag is backed by our Manufacturer Warranty, so your purchase is virtually Risk-Free!
COMPACT SIZE - This crossbody sling bag is 13 inches in height and 7 inches in width

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Introducing our newest SLING BAG. Functional design with an urban look. Peak Gear's proven QUALITY and DESIGN means you are ready for your next adventure. Features: Water-resistant, easy-care shellCompact for easy travelMagnetic closureComfortable shoulder strapAdjustable for left or right-handed use Includes ReturnMe ID tag with lifetime Lost & Found service. Added peace of mind to help you recover lost/misplaced bags from anywhere in the world.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very well made
reviews.reviewText: I use this backpack whenever I take my pooch to the park or long walk. I really like it because it holds my wallet, cell phone, pack of tissue, lip balm, readers, air canister, treats. The front of the bag has a magnetic closure & I store the tissue, treats, doggie bags & canister - items I can get quickly and ones that are not expensive. It also has a slanted small zippered pocket in front of the bag where I keep more doggie bags. Has a zipper closure around entire bag. Inside it, I store my cell phone, car key, lip balm & other small items. Right behind this is another zipper where I store my wallet & anything else that is important (check, etc.) All of this in a small, lightweight, compact bag! I do not carry a very large wallet. It has a nice wide sturdy adjustable strap. It is perfect for me because I often go to a store or other errand so I have my wallet available. I also often change bags when I'm going somewhere without my dog and it is easy to do with this little gem. In addition to all of this, the company gives you "Return Me" steel identification tag that has a "reward for return written on the other side with an i.d.# and 800 number - you get this if you give a review of the product with the Peak Gear company. It is attached to one of those iron clad wire cords where both ends are screwed to each other. What more can you ask? P.S. I never leave my pooch in the vehicle in the summer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect day travel bag!
reviews.reviewText: I was headed to Universal Studios and wanted a small sling pack that could hold my wallet, cellphone, sunglasses, sunblock...and a few other small items. This bag was very comfortable, had a perfect inside zip pocket that allowed me to ditch my big wallet and safely carry my ID, a credit card and a little cash. It has a nice sleek look. The quality also seems good, as I was pulling it on and off and shoving it in lockers so I could get on rides and it still looks brand new. I do a lot of travelling and am excited to take my new little bag with me! The ONLY suggestion I would have for Peak, should they do any design changes, would be to make the strap have the ability to break down so it can be turned into a fanny pack. I understand this may increase the price, but my little sister had a bag by Vera Bradly that had a removable strap extender...so when I had to put my bag in a locker to get on a ride, she was able to remove the extender strap, and wear it as a fanny pack, which was allowed. Plus, when traveling, I just think it would be nice to have the option. Sometimes the sling strap on a big chest looks a little funny, so rocking the fanny pack would be a nice option...lol. This bag is really terrific and it is refreshing to not pay a fortune for something of such quality!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Product- good. Svc- poor
reviews.reviewText: This sling bag- good. Bag is as advertised and as expected. Fits my needs just fine. Customer support- bad. Peak Gear touts its customer service and satisfaction guarantee. But I've been waiting 1 1/2 days for a response to my email to customer svc about a problem trying to register the product and its ReturnMe feature. I do not consider this wait to be prompt customer svc. This is not only disappointing but also puts Peak Gear's "lifetime" guarantee in doubt. How long would I wait, if I had an actual issue with the bag itself?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE this thing
reviews.reviewText: This is GREAT. I had a small cross-body before, and it worked fairly well, but the strap started to deteriorate. This one holds more than that one did, but not too much (I don’t want to give my husband the opportunity to say, “hey, will you carry this for me?”). I can wear it on my back, or in front, as needed, and it holds everything I want to have handy, but no more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Second purchase. Love this bag
reviews.reviewText: I bought a second one after several years of daily use. And the first one did not wear out or stop functioning, it simply faded from so much use. I will still use the first one for travel, but wanted a new one for city use.Very good structure and just the right size for me. Very well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great design with a single workmanship/design flaw.
reviews.reviewText: I bought and returned two.The design allows it to rest comfortably and controllably (either shoulder) and, most importantly, discreetly.. If not over loaded, it fit under my jacket.Let me back up, I bought this to safely carry passports, cash, wallet, phone and maybe a very small camera in places known for pick pockets. worked like a charm for that. Materials and stitching seemed well done.HOWEVER, the "magnetic catch" on the first one I bought popped off the first day I wore it. I returned and bought another.I wore that one for a week in some fairly sketchy places and felt totally secure. Used it for a trip where somebody in my party lost $450 in cash and his credit cards from his front pocket on same walk.But I got home and noticed that the "magnetic catch" sewing was well on it's way to coming undone. The magnet is a cheap solution which is a surprise since the rest of the pack, materials, sewing, zippers are all above average quality. Velcro? Snap rings? Anything but that darn magnet.So again, this bag is not a camera bag but a descrete valuables carry that's comfortable for hours, goes right or left easily and nearly invisible if you're into basic back wear. It won't really take even a small camera (Sony A6600 with a small 50mm lens) unless it's tiny (Sony RX100 maybe). Nice collection of pockets on the outside (change? flash cards? ), inside (map, snacks?) and deep zippered inside (passport, cards and other super important stuff).So there you are, I bought two, loved them and returned both.
Design, size, quality, every thing is perfect
Buon prodotto, più capiente di quanto pensassi. I materiali buoni ma non ottimi. Lo consiglio

Very nice bag. Looks well made, surprisingly. It is a bit small, so double check the measurements before purchasing. I'm rather hefty, 115kg, and at its longest the strap fits me rather well. So it will fit some bigger folks. It's planned use is cycling. Going to hold my tools and spare tubes and stuff, rather than load it on the bike. I'd recommend it to anyone looking for a small pack to hold essentials or replace a purse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 29, 2019
reviews.reviewText: Brilliant great for hand luggage, great little travel bag
Either it was missed out or it was not given. Dishonest seller and item is not as advertised.
